name: Ocean's Demise
description:
Z - Interact with and progress dialogue
WASD or arrow keys to move (WASD Recommended)
Left Click : Teleport ability
Right Click: Hacking Ability
Esc : Exit Save Menu / Options

Explore the dreamy world of Pandora, a underwater paradise of sea creatures and fish. Make friends with the inhabitants, help them with tasks, and figure out the mystery behind the magical world you were transported to.  Absolutely don't try to hack it.

Note: The game is fragile, please try not to break it. <3
